.. math::

	g{\left (z \right )} = - \frac{r^{7} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{5040} + \frac{r^{6} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{180} - \frac{23 r^{5}}{360} \lambda_{1}^{r} + \frac{7 r^{4}}{18} \lambda_{1}^{r} - \frac{967 r^{3}}{720} \lambda_{1}^{r} + \frac{469 r^{2}}{180} \lambda_{1}^{r} - \frac{363 r}{140} \lambda_{1}^{r} + z^{7} \left(\frac{r^{7} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{5040 \lambda_{1}^{7}} - \frac{r^{6} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{240 \lambda_{1}^{7}} + \frac{5 r^{5} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{144 \lambda_{1}^{7}} - \frac{7 r^{4} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{48 \lambda_{1}^{7}} + \frac{29 r^{3} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{90 \lambda_{1}^{7}} - \frac{7 r^{2} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{20 \lambda_{1}^{7}} + \frac{r \lambda_{1}^{r}}{7 \lambda_{1}^{7}}\right) + z^{6} \left(- \frac{r^{7} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{720 \lambda_{1}^{6}} + \frac{11 r^{6} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{360 \lambda_{1}^{6}} - \frac{19 r^{5} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{72 \lambda_{1}^{6}} + \frac{41 r^{4} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{36 \lambda_{1}^{6}} - \frac{1849 r^{3} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{720 \lambda_{1}^{6}} + \frac{1019 r^{2} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{360 \lambda_{1}^{6}} - \frac{7 r \lambda_{1}^{r}}{6 \lambda_{1}^{6}}\right) + z^{5} \left(\frac{r^{7} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{240 \lambda_{1}^{5}} - \frac{23 r^{6} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{240 \lambda_{1}^{5}} + \frac{69 r^{5} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{80 \lambda_{1}^{5}} - \frac{185 r^{4} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{48 \lambda_{1}^{5}} + \frac{134 r^{3} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{15 \lambda_{1}^{5}} - \frac{201 r^{2} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{20 \lambda_{1}^{5}} + \frac{21 r \lambda_{1}^{r}}{5 \lambda_{1}^{5}}\right) + z^{4} \left(- \frac{r^{7} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{144 \lambda_{1}^{4}} + \frac{r^{6} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{6 \lambda_{1}^{4}} - \frac{113 r^{5} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{72 \lambda_{1}^{4}} + \frac{22 r^{4} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{3 \lambda_{1}^{4}} - \frac{2545 r^{3} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{144 \lambda_{1}^{4}} + \frac{41 r^{2} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{2 \lambda_{1}^{4}} - \frac{35 r \lambda_{1}^{r}}{4 \lambda_{1}^{4}}\right) + z^{3} \left(\frac{r^{7} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{144 \lambda_{1}^{3}} - \frac{25 r^{6} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{144 \lambda_{1}^{3}} + \frac{247 r^{5} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{144 \lambda_{1}^{3}} - \frac{1219 r^{4} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{144 \lambda_{1}^{3}} + \frac{389 r^{3} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{18 \lambda_{1}^{3}} - \frac{949 r^{2} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{36 \lambda_{1}^{3}} + \frac{35 r \lambda_{1}^{r}}{3 \lambda_{1}^{3}}\right) + z^{2} \left(- \frac{r^{7} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{240 \lambda_{1}^{2}} + \frac{13 r^{6} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{120 \lambda_{1}^{2}} - \frac{9 r^{5} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{8 \lambda_{1}^{2}} + \frac{71 r^{4} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{12 \lambda_{1}^{2}} - \frac{3929 r^{3} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{240 \lambda_{1}^{2}} + \frac{879 r^{2} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{40 \lambda_{1}^{2}} - \frac{21 r \lambda_{1}^{r}}{2 \lambda_{1}^{2}}\right) + z \left(\frac{r^{7} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{720 \lambda_{1}} - \frac{3 r^{6} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{80 \lambda_{1}} + \frac{59 r^{5} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{144 \lambda_{1}} - \frac{37 r^{4} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{16 \lambda_{1}} + \frac{319 r^{3} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{45 \lambda_{1}} - \frac{223 r^{2} \lambda_{1}^{r}}{20 \lambda_{1}} + \frac{7 r}{\lambda_{1}} \lambda_{1}^{r}\right) + \lambda_{1}^{r}
